original_text: And she has rebelled against my rules by doing wickedness more than the nations, and against my statutes more than the countries all around her; for they have rejected my rules and have not walked in my statutes.
korean_text: 그가 내 규례를 거슬러서 이방인보다 악을 더 행하며 내 율례도 그리함이 그를 둘러 있는 나라들보다 더하니 이는 그들이 내 규례를 버리고 내 율례를 행하지 아니하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: And she has rebelled against my rules
by doing wickedness more than the nations
more than the countries all around her
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀를 둘러싼 모든 나라들보다 더 많이

sentences.original_text: for they have rejected my rules
and have not walked in my statutes
